dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.
dependencies.name: py-aiohttp

dependencies.description:
Elasticsearch DSL is a high-level library whose aim is to help with
writing and running queries against Elasticsearch. It is built on top of
the official low-level client (elasticsearch-py).
dependencies.name: py-elasticsearch-dsl

dependencies.description:
Hjson is an user interface for JSON. The Python implementation of Hjson
is based on simplejson.
dependencies.name: py-hjson

dependencies.description: Patch asyncio to allow nested event loops.
dependencies.name: py-nest-asyncio

dependencies.description: A Python API to interface with Blue Brain Nexus REST API.
dependencies.name: py-nexus-sdk

dependencies.description:
A simple implementation of the OWL2 RL Profile, as well as a basic RDFS
inference, on top of RDFLib. Based mechanical forward chaining.
dependencies.name: py-owlrl

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
This library is an implementation of the JSON-LD specification in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyld

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description:
RDFLib is a pure Python package for working with RDF. RDFLib contains
most things you need to work with RDF, including: parsers and
serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, N-Quads, Turtle, TriX, Trig and
JSON-LD (via a plugin). a Graph interface which can be backed by any one
of a number of Store implementations store implementations for in-memory
storage and persistent storage on top of the Berkeley DB a SPARQL 1.1
implementation - supporting SPARQL 1.1 Queries and Update statements
dependencies.name: py-rdflib

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Blue Brain Nexus Forge is a domain-agnostic, generic and extensible
Python framework enabling non-expert users to create and manage
knowledge graphs.
name: py-nexusforge

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
